issue.title: [C++] Fix arrow::ipc compiler warning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7176](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7176). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I encountered the compiler warning when building:

reader.cc:998:3: warning: ‘expected_body_buffer_count’ may be used uninitialized in this function [-Wmaybe-uninitialized]
 if (payload.body_buffers.size() != expected_body_buffer_count) {

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7176?focusedCommentId=16974947) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5841
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5841>
